title: Angler Earring
summaries: The Angler Earring is an accessory that increases the player's current Fishing Power by 10 when equipped. The Angler Earring can be acquired as a 1/34 (2.94%) chance reward for completing a fishing quest for the Angler NPC, depending on the number of completed quests and other factors (for details, see Angler).

The Angler will not give the player an Angler Earring as a reward if they already have one in their <linked>inventory</linked> or in any of their <linked>portable storage items</linked> or <linked>loadouts</linked>. However, if the player has all of the Angler's fishing and informational accessories (or their upgrades like the <linked>Angler Tackle Bag</linked> and <linked>Fish Finder</linked>) in their inventories, this rule will be ignored.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC
